messages.subject: OT: Free Online Homeschooling Course
messages.msgSnippet: The How To Provide A High Quality Homeschooling Education On A Budget online class is available for less than 2 weeks as my baby is due to arrive very soon.
messages.messageBody:
The "How To Provide A High Quality Homeschooling Education On A Budget"
online class is available for less than 2 weeks as my baby is due to arrive very soon.

I have received excellent feedback regarding the course from
over 100 "students" since I opened it a little over 2 weeks ago.

New homeschoolers find it very valuable while the more experienced
are really enjoying the links to thousands of free high quality worksheets,
free record-keeping forms, free chore charts and frugal homeschooling tips.

The "Save Your Time, Money & Sanity- Get Organized" lessons have
been a big hit as they have provided many with the motivation, support
and tools to help them organize their homes, their homeschools and
inspire their children to do their chores without arguing.

If the course interests you c'mon in and join us as time is running out!
Here's the link: http://universalclass.com/i/crn/2752.htm


Crystal McNerney
How To Provide A High Quality Homeschooling Education On A Budget
http://universalclass.com/i/crn/2752.htm


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
